text:
Comedian and actress, Tiffany Haddish, is allegedly romantically involved with retired basketball player, Lamar Odom. According to sources, Khloe Kardashian‘s ex-husband and the Girls Trip star have known each other for a while and have been seeing each other low key.

RELATED: Tiffany Haddish Talks About Beyoncé Confronting An Actress

The reports also claimed that the two celebrities have been on and off for a couple of months. Both Haddish and Odom were spotted at the All-Star Bowling Party in Los Angeles and were pictured together.

HAVE YOU READ?: Lamar Odom Talks About Khloe Kardashian’s Pregnancy And Her Relationships
